text.__SUMMARY__: Odetta marci is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell attains a length of 3.8 mm
text.Distribution: This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off Mauritania.
